parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: To give my testimony about what they didâ€¦

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I came to the Jicati Medical Centre

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and there they tricked me and brought me to the hospital in Huancabamba.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: They took a little blood from my finger,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: put me in a bed and then they did the operation on me,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I remember it was at 7 oâ€™clock in the evening.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: The next day they took me in a van,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and threw me out in Ã‘angali.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: From there it took me 3 days to struggle home.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Then I became ill and Iâ€™m still ill today. Â

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I was abandoned by my husband and my children.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I am too poor to send them to school,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: so 3 of them left and went to the jungle.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Only one of them supports me.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: The sterilisation operation has reduced me to this,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: My children and my husband abandoned me because of the operation.
